refnamediv.refpurpose: Secure SOAP Client using X.509 certificate for signing

refsect1.title: Example

itemizedlist.listitem: This chapter demonstrates how to make signed SOAP message.
The signed message contains certificate (only) in the Security header.
In that example no encrypted data is sent, but in practice the both approaches can be combined.
The server checks signature against this certificate and ensures it's validity.

refsect1.para: To run .NET client using X.509 certificate signed message, against Virtuoso service you need:

itemizedlist.listitem: Edit the Makefile and specify in CSLIBFLAGS where Microsoft.Web.Services.DLL reside.
compile the example issuing nmake command in the tutorial/services/ws_s_4 directory.
